sections.title: About me
sections.text: My name is Gustavo. I like to program and I am interested in 3D graphics and creative coding in general. Here are some of my projects. I hope you like them!

sections.title: Games
sections.text: Here are some games/engines that I made (mostly in C++).

items.text: A 3D game engine with a Vulkan rendering backend. Written in c++.

items.name: F90
items.text: A 3D person shooter made with my Bloss1 engine

items.name: ElJuego
items.text: A mech shoot 'em up made in Godot

items.name: The Vops
items.text: A devops inspired resource management game made for the build to scale GMTK 2024 game jam
